4306210.name: White Silence
4306210.description:
After crashing in the winter wilderness, you come to in the middle of a blizzard. The forest is dead, the roads have disappeared, communication is lost. The only chance for salvation is a village hidden in the snow. Lights are on in the houses. The tracks lead nowhere. Sometimes it feels like you're being watched. The deeper you go, the clearer it becomes: you're not alone here—they're waiting for you. Your goal is simple—to get out.

But the longer you stay, the more the silence weighs on you.

Sometimes it feels like the village is alive.

Sometimes, it feels like it's just watching you disappear.

Game Genre: Walking Simulator
Average game duration: 30 minutes

Features

  • Atmospheric first-person horror

  • Winter blizzard

  • Abandoned village

  • Constant threat from the unknown

  • Snow is also a feature
